name: Morality (Lytorika)
description:
This is my first try at something like a Dating Sim/ Visual Novel. It was really fun to create the characters and backgrounds & I definetely learned how to navigate RenPy better.

The game is just a really short demo, but I still tried to give an idea of the character's personalities.

You'll choose one of the two love interests by deciding whether your date is a good or a bad person. The outcome of your date will change depending on what options you pick!

There is 1 good end with a CG & 1 bad end with no CG for both characters.

If you'd like to support me and my art, I have a Patreon as well as a KoFi:

https://www.patreon.com/lytorika

https://ko-fi.com/lytorika
